title: Mayfield and Stefanski Breaking News, Chiefs and Chargers on TNF, Advantages in Patriots-Colts, plus can the Packers hold the NFC lead?
itunes:title: Mayfield and Stefanski Breaking News, Chiefs and Chargers on TNF, Advantages in Patriots-Colts, plus can the Packers hold the NFC lead?
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Guest Co-host/Actor Brian Baumgartner start the show with breaking news from Will Selva on the positive COVID tests from Browns HC Kevin Stefanski and QB Baker Mayfield. The Chiefs and Chargers kick off Week 15, so the crew looks at which team is playing better right now as well as who will be the player duo to shine. The crew differs on who has the edge between the Patriots and Colts, plus as a Packers fan, Brian doesn't understand how the NFC isn't the Packers to lose at this point.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
